content: विलसित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Glittering, shining, gleaming. {@--2@} Appeared, manifested. {@--3@} Sportive, wanton. --तं {@--1@} Glittering, gleaming. {@--2@} A gleam, flash; रोधोभुवां मुहुग्मुत्र हिरण्मयीनां भासस्तडिद्विलसितानि विडंबयंति <ls>Ki. 5. 46.</ls> <ls>Me. 81</ls>, <ls>V. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Appearance, manifestation; as in अज्ञानाविलसितं &c. {@--4@} Sport, play, dalliance, amorous or wanton gesture (<ab>fig.</ab> also); अतिपिशुनानि चैकांतनिष्टुरस्य दवैह कस्य विलसितानि <ls>K.</ls> {@--5@} Action or gesture in general. {@--6@} Effect, fruit, result; <ls>Māl. 2. 9.</ls>
